H0.text: Brain cells are where meiosis occurs, a type of cell division in which germ cells divide to produce haploid cells.

H1.text: Bone cells are the cells where meiosis occurs, which is a type of cell division in which germ cells divide to produce haploid cells.

H2.text: Muscle cells are where meiosis, a type of cell division in which germ cells divide to produce haploid cells, occurs.

H3.text: Ovary cells are where meiosis occurs, a type of cell division in which germ cells divide to produce haploid cells.

A4.text: Primordial follicles contain oocytes that are at an intermediate (prophase I) stage of meiosis.
